level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2(d) of Rent Control Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-470, July 31, 2006, 53 DCR 6772).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-10, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3501.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Termination of Law 6-10: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42- 3502.01.
